左乐：此次前赴大荒城，有博士协助，想必路途会轻松不少.Translation: Zuo Le: With the Doctor's assistance on our journey to the Great Wilderness City, it should be much easier.

左乐:博士，前方道路开放还有20s.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the path ahead will be open for another 20 seconds.

左乐:山洞的入口还需要30s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: The cave entrance will still need 30 seconds to open.

左乐:博士，前方的道路还有20s清理，这里的藤蔓可以攀爬，注意脚下.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the path ahead will take another 20 seconds to clear; the vines here can be climbed, so watch your step.

左乐:博士，山洞的出口还需要30s清理.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the cave exit still needs 30 seconds to clear.

左乐:博士，前面就是大荒城了，道路还有30s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, we're almost at the Great Wilderness City; the path ahead will be open for another 30 seconds.

左乐：大荒城大门还有20s打开.Translation: Zuo Le: The main gate of the Great Wilderness City will open in 20 seconds.

左乐：前方门还有30s打开.Translation: Zuo Le: The door ahead will open in 30 seconds.

祖宗发射器将在15s内充能完毕，请远离轰炸区域.Translation: The Ancestor Launcher will be charged in 15 seconds; please stay away from the bombing area.

左乐：博士，我们已经进入大荒城.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, we have entered the Great Wilderness City.

左乐：由于天灾和邪魔污染等原因，大荒城农田耕种使用划分好的移动地块，以及密切监测.Translation: Zuo Le: Due to natural disasters and demonic pollution, the farmland in the Great Wilderness City uses designated mobile plots, with drones closely monitoring crop growth.

左乐：博士，前方就是大荒城每年祭祀使用的广场了，道路还有40s开放。.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, ahead is the square used for annual sacrifices in the Great Wilderness City; the path will be open for another 40 seconds.

左乐：每年劳作人民都会在此向神农祈福，以求来年风调雨顺.Translation: Zuo Le: Every year, the hardworking people come here to pray to Shennong for a bountiful harvest in the coming year.

左乐：前方的道路好像正在施工，我们走旁边的祭祀台吧.Translation: Zuo Le: It seems the road ahead is under construction; let's take the side altar instead.

左乐：博士，祭祀台上的人有些多，我们稍等20s.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, there are quite a few people on the altar; let's wait for 20 seconds.

左乐：祭祀台上的建筑，据说是传说中的神农使用的神农锁.Translation: Zuo Le: The structure on the altar is said to be the Shennong Lock used by the legendary Shennong.

左乐：除了神农锁，神农还拥有一把可医治万物的神农尺，以后有时间再和博士慢慢道来.Translation: Zuo Le: In addition to the Shennong Lock, Shennong also possesses the Shennong Ruler, which can heal all things; I will tell you more about it later when we have time.

左乐：博士，跟紧我，你是第一次来大荒城，最好不要乱跑.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, stay close to me; it's your first time in the Great Wilderness City, so it's best not to wander off.

左乐：博士，前方的道路还有20s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the path ahead will be open for another 20 seconds.

左乐：博士，前方就是农田区域了，道路还有30s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, we're approaching the farmland area; the path will be open for another 30 seconds.

左乐：前方稻田的监测无人机似乎有些不对劲，博士请小心.Translation: Zuo Le: The monitoring drones in the rice fields ahead seem a bit off; please be careful, Doctor.

左乐：博士小心，之前清除的邪魔污染还有残留.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, be careful; there are still remnants of the demonic pollution we cleared before.

左乐：这里的水田已经被污染了.Translation: Zuo Le: The water fields here have been contaminated.

左乐：博士，下一扇门打开还有30s.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the next door will open in 30 seconds.

左乐：只靠我们的力量无法解决这些污染，需要尽快前往大荒城核心启动净化装置.Translation: Zuo Le: We can't solve this pollution with our strength alone; we need to head to the core of the Great Wilderness City to activate the purification device as soon as possible.

左乐：博士，下一扇门打开还有20s.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the next door will open in 20 seconds.

左乐：打开实验室大门的钥匙应该就在实验室里面，仔细找一找吧.Translation: Zuo Le: The key to open the laboratory door should be inside the lab; please look carefully.

左乐：大门钥匙在这里.Translation: Zuo Le: The main door key is here.

左乐：博士，前方区域还有20s开放.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, the area ahead will remain open for another 20 seconds.

左乐：博士，前面就是大荒城的核心城了，我们要抓紧时间.Translation: Zuo Le: Doctor, ahead is the core city of the Great Wilderness; we need to hurry.

左乐：前方移动地块下降还有30s.Translation: Zuo Le: The moving plot ahead will descend in 30 seconds.

左乐：核心城门打开还需要30s.Translation: Zuo Le: The core city gate will take another 30 seconds to open.

PRTS：净化装置将在15s后运行.Translation: PRTS: The purification device will activate in 15 seconds.
